title: Subpart 231-5 - New Major Facilities and Modifications to Existing Non-Major Facilities in Nonattainment Areas, and Attainment Areas of the State Within the Ozone Transport Region
content:

State Regulations
§ 231-5.1 - Applicability

§ 231-5.3 - Permit content and terms of issuance

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
